20110129023253.000|20110129023254.000|CC1|CAIRO.

20110129023423.000|20110129023427.000|CC1|GREATER.

20110129023431.000|20110129023433.000|CC1|POLICE TO STOP THEM.

20110129023434.000|20110129023436.000|CC1|LONG BANNED HERE, JOINED THE    
20110129023436.000|20110129023438.000|CC1|PROTEST.                        
20110129023438.000|20110129023440.000|CC1|EGYPT HAS SAID IT'S CRACKING    
20110129023440.000|20110129023442.000|CC1|DOWN TO MAINTAIN ORDER AND TO   
20110129023442.000|20110129023443.000|CC1|PREVENT THE COUNTRY FROM FALLING
20110129023443.000|20110129023445.000|CC1|TO ISLAMIC RADICALS.            
20110129023445.000|20110129023447.000|CC1|AS EVENING FELL, POLICE VEHICLES
20110129023447.000|20110129023448.000|CC1|WERE ATTACKED ON BRIDGES AND SET
20110129023448.000|20110129023451.000|CC1|ON FIRE.

20110129023453.000|20110129023456.000|CC1|FOR THE FIRST TIME CALLED IN THE
20110129023456.000|20110129023458.000|CC1|ARMY.                           
20110129023458.000|20110129023459.000|CC1|BUT WHEN ARMY ARMORED VEHICLES  
20110129023459.000|20110129023501.000|CC1|ROLLED INTO CAIRO, THEY SEEMED  
20110129023501.000|20110129023501.000|CC1|TO TAKE NO ACTION AGAINST THE   
20110129023501.000|20110129023504.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATORS.

20110129023506.000|20110129023507.000|CC1|MILITARY VEHICLES, CLIMBED ON   
20110129023507.000|20110129023509.000|CC1|TOP OF THEM, CHEERED THE

20110129023517.000|20110129023519.000|CC1|PAST.

20110129023523.000|20110129023525.000|CC1|>> SO, RICHARD, THE QUESTION IS 
20110129023525.000|20110129023526.000|CC1|WHAT IS THIS EXACTLY?           
20110129023526.000|20110129023528.000|CC1|IT IS CITIZENS AND NOT LIKE THE

20110129023549.000|20110129023551.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT'S VERY HARD TO  
20110129023551.000|20110129023552.000|CC1|KNOW BECAUSE THIS IS NOT A      
20110129023552.000|20110129023555.000|CC1|CENTRALLY ORGANIZED PROTEST.    
20110129023555.000|20110129023556.000|CC1|IT BEGAN WITH THE UNEMPLOYED,   
20110129023556.000|20110129023558.000|CC1|STUDENTS, PEOPLE WHO HAVE HAD   
20110129023558.000|20110129023559.000|CC1|ENOUGH OF THE CORRUPT SYSTEM    
20110129023559.000|20110129023601.000|CC1|THAT HAS BEEN IN PLACE IN EGYPT 
20110129023601.000|20110129023602.000|CC1|FOR A LONG TIME.                
20110129023602.000|20110129023604.000|CC1|BUT THEN AS THE PROTESTS STARTED
20110129023604.000|20110129023605.000|CC1|TO GAIN MOMENTUM, ISLAMIC       
20110129023605.000|20110129023607.000|CC1|MOVEMENTS, THE MUSLIM           
20110129023607.000|20110129023608.000|CC1|BROTHERHOOD, WHICH IS BY FAR THE
20110129023608.000|20110129023610.000|CC1|BIGGEST UNDERGROUND ORGANIZATION

20110129023612.000|20110129023613.000|CC1|INVOLVED AND MANY PEOPLE IN THIS
20110129023613.000|20110129023615.000|CC1|COUNTRY ARE WORRIED THAT IF THIS
20110129023615.000|20110129023617.000|CC1|PROTEST CONTINUES AND SERIOUSLY 
20110129023617.000|20110129023618.000|CC1|TOPPLES THE REGIME, THE MUSLIM  
20110129023618.000|20110129023619.000|CC1|BROTHERHOOD WILL TRY TO MAKE A  
20110129023619.000|20110129023620.000|CC1|RUN FOR POWER.

20110129023631.000|20110129023634.000|CC1|STAYED OFF TELEVISION ALL DAY

20110129023653.000|20110129023654.000|CC1|TODAY THEY WERE LIKE US,

20110129023659.000|20110129023701.000|CC1|TRACKING DOWN THE SAME RUMORS WE
20110129023701.000|20110129023701.000|CC1|WERE TRACKING DOWN.             
20110129023701.000|20110129023703.000|CC1|THEY DIDN'T HAVE A LOT OF       
20110129023703.000|20110129023704.000|CC1|INFORMATION.                    
20110129023704.000|20110129023706.000|CC1|IT WAS AT A 4:00 MEETING WITH   
20110129023706.000|20110129023707.000|CC1|HIS PRINCIPALS, VICE PRESIDENT  
20110129023707.000|20110129023709.000|CC1|BIDEN, SECRETARY CLINTON, THE   
20110129023709.000|20110129023711.000|CC1|NEW CHIEF OF STAFF, ADMIRAL

20110129023716.000|20110129023716.000|CC1|THAT'S WHEN THE WHOLE THING SET

20110129023718.000|20110129023719.000|CC1|PRESIDENT SHARED WITH THE PUBLIC
20110129023719.000|20110129023720.000|CC1|ABOUT HIS CONVERSATION WITH     
20110129023720.000|20110129023724.000|CC1|PRESIDENT MUBARAK.              
20110129023724.000|20110129023725.000|CC1|>> WHEN PRESIDENT MUBARAK       
20110129023725.000|20110129023728.000|CC1|ADDRESSED THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE   
20110129023728.000|20110129023730.000|CC1|TONIGHT, HE PLEDGED A BETTER
